meanings.definition: Self-assertive or proud to an irritating degree.
meanings.sent1: The bumptious child always insisted on having their way.
meanings.sent2: She found his bumptious behavior off-putting.
meanings.sent3: The bumptious squirrel thought it owned the entire park.
meanings.sent4: Her bumptious attitude was like a loud trumpet in a quiet room.
meanings.sent5: The bumptious rooster strutted around the farm, crowing loudly.

meanings.sent1: The bumptious man talked loudly to show off his knowledge.
meanings.sent2: His bumptious remarks made everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent3: The bumptious peacock paraded around, displaying its colorful feathers.
meanings.sent4: Her bumptious behavior was like a flashy neon sign in a dim room.
meanings.sent5: The bumptious car salesman tried to impress customers with false promises.
